Namespace SharpSDL3.Mixer

Classes

Mixer

Structs

Chunk

The internal format for an audio chunk

Music
MusicInterface

Defines an interface for a music backend in SDL3_mixer, specifying how to load, play, and manage music data.

Enums

AudioDeviceId
Fading

The different fading types supported

Mixer.MixInit

The internal format for a music chunk interpreted via codecs

MusicApi
MusicMetaTag
MusicType

These are types of music files (not libraries used to load them)

Delegates

Mixer.Mix_ChannelFinishedCallback
Mixer.Mix_EachSoundFontCallback
Mixer.Mix_EffectDone_t

This is a callback that signifies that a channel has finished all its loops and has completed playback.

Mixer.Mix_EffectFunc_t

This is the format of a special effect callback:

myeffect(int chan, void *stream, int len, void *udata);

Mixer.Mix_MixCallback
Mixer.MusicFinishedCallback
MusicInterface.CloseDelegate

Closes the backend and cleans up resources.

MusicInterface.CreateFromFileDelegate

Creates a music object from a file, used when SDL_IOStream is not supported.

MusicInterface.CreateFromIODelegate

Creates a music object from an SDL_IOStream.

MusicInterface.DeleteDelegate

Deletes a music object, freeing its resources.

MusicInterface.DurationDelegate

Gets the total duration of the music.

MusicInterface.GetAudioDelegate

Retrieves audio data from a music object.

MusicInterface.GetMetaTagDelegate

Retrieves a metadata tag from the music.

MusicInterface.GetNumTracksDelegate

Gets the number of tracks in the music.

MusicInterface.GetVolumeDelegate

Gets the volume for a music object.

MusicInterface.IsPlayingDelegate

Checks if a music object is currently playing.

MusicInterface.JumpDelegate

Jumps to a specific order in MOD music.

MusicInterface.LoadDelegate

Loads the backend library.

MusicInterface.LoopEndDelegate

Gets the loop end position of the music.

MusicInterface.LoopLengthDelegate

Gets the loop length of the music.

MusicInterface.LoopStartDelegate

Gets the loop start position of the music.

MusicInterface.OpenDelegate

Initializes the backend for audio output with the specified audio specification.

MusicInterface.PauseDelegate

Pauses playback of the music.

MusicInterface.PlayDelegate

Starts playing a music object from the beginning.

MusicInterface.ResumeDelegate

Resumes playback of the music.

MusicInterface.SeekDelegate

Seeks to a specific position in the music.

MusicInterface.SetVolumeDelegate

Sets the volume for a music object.

MusicInterface.StartTrackDelegate

Starts playback from a specific track.

MusicInterface.StopDelegate

Stops playback of the music.

MusicInterface.TellDelegate

Gets the current playback position of the music.

MusicInterface.UnloadDelegate

Unloads the backend library.
